hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Tag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Could be any desired TAG (without the 'F' prefix) or branch name

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
artifactory_host=test-artifactory artifactory_url=https://$artifactory_host/sbc-release/com/ac/sbc/ISO curlHasFailed="False" JENKINS_URL='https://test-jenkins' JOB_NAME='job/sbc-iso' JOB_TOKEN='sbcCreateISO' #Branch=`git branch --no-color -r --contains HEAD | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` mkdir artifacts #get the relevant ISO FILE curl -k --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/${Branch}/${Tag}/sbc-F${Tag}.iso" || curlHasFailed="True" if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then echo "sbc-F${Tag}.iso not Exists in Artifactory" echo "****************Create a new ISO*******************" #trigger sbc-iso job to create ISO curl --insecure -v -X POST $JENKINS_URL/$JOB_NAME/buildWithParameters?token=${JOB_TOKEN} --data "Tag=${Tag}" >output 2>&1
cat output #check if job is in queue queueURL=$(cat output | grep Location | cut -d' ' -f3) queueURL=$(echo $queueURL | tr -d '\r\n') echo $queueURL #failed to start the build if [[ $queueURL == "" ]] then echo "Failed to start the build remotely Exiting the build" exit 1 fi #if not find ERROR 404 or EXECUTABLE (BUILD NUMBER) DONT FAIL THE BUILD set +e inQueue=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "executable") ERROR=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "Error 404") queueJson=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json?pretty=true) while [[ "$inQueue" == "" && $ERROR == "" ]] do echo "************BUILD STILL IN QUEUE**************************" sleep 20 buildNumber=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json?pretty=true | grep number) inQueue=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "executable") echo $inQueue ERROR=$(curl --insecure -X GET ${queueURL}api/json | grep "Error 404") echo $ERROR done set -e if [[ $ERROR != "" ]] then echo "Failed to start the job after been in queue... Exit the build" exit 1 fi buildNumber=$(echo $buildNumber | cut -d':' -f2 |sed s'/[," ]//g') echo $buildNumber #check if job is running JOB_URL=$JENKINS_URL/$JOB_NAME/$buildNumber/api/json curl --insecure --silent $JOB_URL | grep result\":null > /dev/null GREP_RETURN_CODE=$? # Poll every thirty seconds until the build is finished (if result is 0 its "IN PROGRESS" if result is 1 the job FINISHED running set +e while [ $GREP_RETURN_CODE -eq 0 ] do echo "************BUILD IS RUNNING**************************" sleep 240 # Grep will return 0 while the build is running curl --insecure --silent $JOB_URL | grep result\":null > /dev/null GREP_RETURN_CODE=$? done set -e #check JOB STATUS IF PASSED OR FAILED JOB_STATUS=$(curl --insecure -X GET $JENKINS_URL/$JOB_NAME/$buildNumber/api/json?pretty=true | grep result | cut -d':' -f2 | sed 's/[", ]//g') echo $JOB_STATUS if [[ "$JOB_STATUS" == "FAULURE" ]] then echo "Failed to create ISO in job sbc-iso build number $buildNumber" exit 1 fi echo "****************Finish Creating a new ISO*******************" #get the relevant ISO FILE curlHasFailed="False" curl -k --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/${Branch}/${Tag}/sbc-F${Tag}.iso" || curlHasFailed="True" if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then echo "sbc-F${Tag}.iso not Exists in Artifactory" exit 1 fi
fi #run script ./MediantVEBuild/build_sbc.sh --flavor=${Environment} --iso=${WORKSPACE}/sbc-F${Tag}.iso --baseline=${Tag} --outputdir=${WORKSPACE}/artifacts
